name: Margherita
description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a crisp crust.

name: Veggie supreme
description: Loaded with a variety of garden-fresh vegetables for a colorful and hearty bite.

name: Garden fresh
description: Bursting with spinach, broccoli, tomatoes, and mushrooms for a healthy, fresh option.

name: Spinach feta
description: A Mediterranean-inspired pizza with tender spinach and creamy feta cheese.

name: Paneer tikka
description: A fusion of Indian flavors featuring marinated paneer tikka and spicy toppings.

name: Four cheese
description: A rich blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola for cheese lovers.

name: Pesto veggie
description: Topped with basil pesto and a mix of artichokes, sun-dried tomatoes, and mozzarella.

name: Farmhouse pizza
description: A rustic pizza with corn, mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions on a robust tomato base.

name: Potato rosemary pizza
description: Thinly sliced roasted potatoes and rosemary on a creamy cheese base for a fragrant, savory treat.

name: BBQ veggie pizza
description: Smoky barbecue sauce topped with grilled vegetables and red onions for a zesty kick.

name: Greek pizza
description: A Mediterranean mix of olives, feta cheese, tomatoes, and red onions with oregano.

name: Roasted veggie pizza
description: Features oven-roasted zucchini, bell peppers, eggplant, and onions for deep, savory flavors.
